name: Kirby Super Star Maze
description:
What started as a School Project, is now a game for anyone to play!

Help Kirby reach the end of the maze to find a way out of there!

The game controls are very simple:

WASD or Arrow keys to roll Kirby around the maze

(I don't own this game's music, font, or character. This is simply a Nintendo fan game.)

(I do own the assets though)
